name: geekslides
description: Geekslides is oriented towards creating effective remote presentations, specially for empowering learning experiences.

scripts.install: npm i --prefix broker && npm i --prefix demo && npm i --prefix slides
scripts.start: demo/node_modules/concurrently/bin/concurrently.js --kill-others  "npm --prefix demo run watch-sass" "npm --prefix demo run server" "npm --prefix broker run start" "npm --prefix slides run start"

//: "npm --prefix demo run watch-sass" "npm --prefix demo run server"
